name: queenly-majesty
effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon's majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
flavor_text_entries.the-teal-mask: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
